meta_title: What is SPC? Statistical Process Control Meaning & Benefits
meta_description: Statistical Process Control (SPC) uses data to monitor machine health and process stability. Understand how SPC prevents downtime and improves industrial quality.
title: What is SPC (Statistical Process Control)?

hero_image.alt: Hero image for What is SPC (Statistical Process Control)?

image_prompt: A high-tech industrial control room overlooking a modern factory floor. In the foreground, a large digital monitor displays a professional Statistical Process Control chart with green and red data points and clear Upper/Lower Control Limit lines. A diverse group of three engineers in clean PPE and hardhats are discussing the data on a tablet. The background shows blurred robotic assembly arms and IIoT-enabled machinery. Photo-realistic, 8k resolution, cinematic lighting, professional industrial atmosphere.
